name: Hard to implement with Sign-In-Widget
title: Hard to implement with Sign-In-Widget
body:
Original Confluence URL: https://qbdocs.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/IAM/pages/1280180234 - please cross-check the quality of the ZD article with the Confluence counterpart and remove this line before publishing the ZD article

Here is a list of features that are to hard to implement if we are using the current status of the Sign-In-Widget of Okta.

As soon as the number of features reaches a critical mass we should think about rewriting the Sign-In-Widget.

Topic

Description

Category

Jira Ticket

IdP discovery email validation

Currently the email-addresses in the IdP discovery are not validated. Invalid strings are possible.

Functionality

Detailed password rules

There is a proposal by Sara showing a very detailed list of password rules. This is not implementable without changing the Sign-In-Widget code.

UX/Design

Questback9f8e3c23-9700-315b-9fb0-65f274062d6eIAM-396

Wording

Currently we cannot easily adapt the wording without changing the sign-in-widget code.
